verses.name: Amos 8:1
verses.text: Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me: and behold a basket of summer fruit.

verses.name: Amos 8:2
verses.text: And he said, Amos, what seest thou? And I said, A basket of summer fruit. Then said the Lord unto me, The end is come upon my people of Israel; I will not again pass by them any more.

verses.name: Amos 8:3
verses.text: And the songs of the temple shall be howlings in that day, saith the Lord God: there shall be many dead bodies in every place; they shall cast them forth with silence.
